bug.author: stephanie-wang
bug.summary: [core] PIDs in log files do not match the process
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): 0.9dev The log files show what I think should be a PID/TID. These used to match the actual process ID, but no longer do. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Any ray script.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
